    • Method Detail

      • getLoginPlayerObject

        public LapisLoginAPIPlayer getLoginPlayerObject(UUID uuid)
        Use this to get the LapisLoginAPIPlayer to get access to player information
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player you want data on
        Returns:
        returns a LapisLoginAPIPlayer which can be used to both read and write information on a player
